name: TwoDoors (Phil033)
description:
Solve puzzles in an ancient ruin and choose the correct of two doors.

First-Person puzzle-platformer.

Made in under 48h for the United-Game-Jam.

All code, asssets, etc. were made by me, the sounds are taken from freesounds.org (links below).

Music( https://freesound.org/people/klavo1985/sounds/496400/ )

SFX( https://freesound.org/people/blaukreuz/sounds/52143/ )
